description: This file implements HTTP and Digest authentication handling for a CCSP CWMP protocol connection request handler, including functions for generating challenges, parsing auth headers, calculating digest responses, and generating HTTP response headers with authentication challenges.

methods.name: PUCHAR CcspCwmpTcpcrhoSkipWS(PUCHAR pMsg,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Skips leading whitespace characters (spaces and tabs) in a message buffer.

methods.name: PUCHAR CcspCwmpTcpcrhoSkipTrailingWS(PUCHAR pMsg,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Skips trailing whitespace characters from the end of a message buffer.

methods.name: void CcspCwmpTcpcrhoBinToHex(PUCHAR Bin,ULONG ulBinLen,PUCHAR Hex)
methods.description: Converts a binary string to a hexadecimal string representation.

methods.name: PUCHAR CcspCwmpTcpcrhoFindHeader(PUCHAR pMsg,ULONG ulSize,PUCHAR pHeaderName,PULONG pulHdrValueOffset,PULONG pulHdrValueLen)
methods.description: Finds an HTTP header by name within a message buffer.

methods.name: PUCHAR CcspCwmpTcpcrhoCalcDigResponse(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pMethodName,PUCHAR pUserName,PUCHAR pPassword,PUCHAR pRealm,PUCHAR pAlgorithm,PUCHAR pNonce,PUCHAR pCNonce,PUCHAR pQop,PUCHAR pNC,PUCHAR pEntityDigest,PUCHAR pDigestUri)
methods.description: Calculates the digest response based on provided inputs for HTTP Digest Authentication.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoCalcDigestHA1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pUserName,PUCHAR pPassword,PUCHAR pRealm,PUCHAR pAlgorithm,PUCHAR pNonce,PUCHAR pCNonce,PUCHAR pHA1)
methods.description: Calculates the HA1 hash for HTTP Digest Authentication based on username, realm, password, and algorithm.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoCalcDigestHA2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pMethodName,PUCHAR pQop,PUCHAR pEntityDigest,PUCHAR pDigestUri,PUCHAR pHA2)
methods.description: Calculates the HA2 hash for HTTP Digest Authentication based on method, URI, and other parameters.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGetRequestHostUri(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,PUCHAR * ppHostName,PUSHORT pHostPort,PUCHAR * ppUriPath)
methods.description: Extracts the host, port, and URI path from an HTTP request message.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGetAuthInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Retrieves authentication info from HTTP request headers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGetDigestAuthInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hAuthInfo,PUCHAR pDigData)
methods.description: Parses digest auth header data into structured digest info.

methods.name: PUCHAR CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGenBasicChallenge(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pRealm)
methods.description: Generates a Basic authentication challenge string based on realm.

methods.name: PUCHAR CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGenDigestChallenge(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pRealm,PUCHAR pDomain,PUCHAR pAlgorithm,PUCHAR pQop,PUCHAR pNonce,BOOL bNonceExpired)
methods.description: Generates a Digest authentication challenge string with various parameters.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGenBasicResponse(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,PULONG pulSize,PUCHAR pRealm)
methods.description: Constructs an HTTP response with Basic authentication challenge.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGenDigestResponse(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,PULONG pulSize,PUCHAR pRealm,PUCHAR pDomain,PUCHAR pAlgorithm,PUCHAR pQop,PUCHAR pNonce,BOOL bNonceExpired)
methods.description: Constructs an HTTP response with Digest authentication challenge.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGenResponse(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,PULONG pulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hAuthHeader)
methods.description: Generates the full HTTP response message including headers and body.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGenNonce(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pNonce,ULONG ulNonceLen)
methods.description: Generates a nonce value for authentication.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoVerify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hAuthInfo,PUCHAR pPassword,ULONG ulServerAuthType,PUCHAR pServerAuthRealm,PUCHAR pServerNonce,ULONG ulNonceTimeout,ULONG ulNonceTimestamp)
methods.description: Verifies user's credentials based on HTTP request message and authentication info, supporting Basic and Digest authentication types.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpTcpcrhoGenResResponse(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,PULONG pulSize,char * pMediaType,char * pRes,ULONG ulResLen)
methods.description: Generates an HTTP response for resource retrieval requests, including headers such as Content-Type, Connection, Server, Date, and Content-Length, and appends resource content if provided.

ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pMethodName,PUCHAR pUserName,PUCHAR pPassword,PUCHAR pRealm,PUCHAR pAlgorithm,PUCHAR pNonce,PUCHAR pCNonce,PUCHAR pQop,PUCHAR pNC,PUCHAR pEntityDigest,PUCHAR pDigestUri)
